string-array.name: notes_from_dev
string-array.item: You may want to use SMSdroid to read incoming messages.
Dec. 2010 Drafts: Drafts are saved in android\'s message database. Use SMSdroid or android\'s messaging app to send them later.
Dec. 2010 GMX Downtime: The GMX service is down for days now. This is not a problem of this app! Please read further information here: http://code.google.com/p/websmsdroid/issues/detail?id=417
